Hey! See those people all standing there. They are on
strike because they don't think their wages are fair.
You saw this happen in the past. Do you remember how
long those people waited after giving their demands to
the boss before they walked out on their work?
5 days
1 week
2 weeks
5 days
Close! Try again.
1 week
Right! You need to give notice before you go on strike
now. What is the minimum amount of time a labour force
must give notice today before going on strike?
5 days
1 week
2 weeks
5 days
Close! Try again.
1 week
Close! Try again.
2 weeks
Right! After that it all comes down to negotiations.
Hopefully these people get what they are asking for!
Thanks for answering my questions! Here take this.
You received a Square Piece!
Bye!
It looks like you got all 8 pieces! Better return to

Modern Kid
Hello! You've finally made it!
Modern Kid
You look a bit confused, but that is to be
expected. You have just been transported
back to the present!
Modern Kid
Home? Oh no, no, no. You are still in the
museum. Don't you recognize where you are
standing?
Modern Kid
Surely you must see some similarities?
It's the same city you just traveled from!
Modern Kid
You've done great so far but now there are
just a few more tasks left to finish
before you can get the key piece you seek.
Modern Kid
In this area there are 8 different people
or things you will need to interact with
in order to collect a small square item.
Modern Kid
Many of the tasks or questions will
relate to what you saw in the past. You
can always return to the past if you think
you missed something.
Modern Kid
Once you have all 8 square pieces, come
back and see me!
Then I'll help you find the key piece.
Modern Kid
Good luck!
B
Come find me after you have all 8 pieces!
If you don't know where to go, just start talking to
people.
Modern Kid
You got all the pieces!
Can I see them for a moment?
The kid pulls out a box, fits the square pieces
into the space on top and hands it back.
1, 2, 3 in the top row,
3, 4, 5 in the middle row,
7, 8 in the bottom row.
Just as you are about to ask what you do now, the
squares begin to glow!
The squares now show pieces of an image! But the
squares aren't in the right place...
Modern Kid
In order to get the piece of key you are
looking for, you need to solve the slide
puzzle on the box.
Modern Kid
When the squares are in the right spot and
the image is complete, the box will open.
Modern Kid
If you don't want to solve the puzzle right
away, you can always find it in your Key
Items. Leaving and returning to the puzzle
will reset it. Good luck!
Modern Kid
You completed the puzzle! Well done!
Good luck finding the rest of the key
pieces!
We have lots of ways to transport people and goods
these days. Subway trains, cars, buses,
planes and boats! Transport has come a long way.
Through this door you can find models of different
forms of transport.
Correctly bring me the 3 models that
represent the forms of transport you saw or used in the
past and I will give you something in return.
That's great! You brought me all the correct models.
Here, take this.
You received a Square Piece!
Please put the models back for me.
I might get in trouble if I am found holding them all
A
It looks like you got all 8 pieces! Better return to
the kid by the subway entrance.
A
Please bring me the 3 models that best represent the
transport you saw in the past.
You have 2 out of 3 correct. Return the one you think
is wrong and bring me a different model in its place.
You have 1 out of 3 correct. Return the two you think
are wrong and bring me different models in their place.
Good luck collecting the rest of those pieces!
Good luck collecting the rest of those pieces!
A long time ago there used to be a factory in this
city. But it was torn down and replaced with a new
business building.
This used to be a bunch of old housing, but now
they are being rebuilt into new high-rise apartments.

Burning coal produced three harmful gases. Which gas,
when combined with oxygen, produces carbon dioxide?
Sulfer Dioxide
Carbon Monoxide
Nitrogen Oxide
Sulfer Dioxide
Not quite.
Carbon Monoxide
Right! And did you know that carbon dioxide breaks down
our Ozone layer? You should look more into that.
Which of those three gases is harmful to human health?
Sulfer Dioxide
Carbon Monoxide
Nitrogen Oxide
All of them
Sulfer Dioxide
You're right! But all three are actually harmful!
Carbon Monoxide
You're right! But all three are actually harmful!
Nitrogen Oxide
You're right! But all three are actually harmful!
All of them
That's right!
Exposure to these gases increase the risk of developing
lung cancer, stroke, heart disease, chronic respiratory
diseases and other lethal infections.
Unless we take coal completely out of use, this will
continue to be a problem for anyone that works with it.
